summary: AVP / Director of Information Technology with extensive IT leadership experience, including network engineering, ERP implementations, and technology-driven cost savings. Known for excellent communication, problem solving, independent work and strong collaboration; adept at driving projects from conception to deployment while maintaining priorities and delivering reliable systems.

experience.title: Information Technology Coordinator
experience.description: Sole point of contact for 150 staff including remote staff; led a $300,000 Navision ERP implementation; upgraded Navision to SQL 2000; created and refined custom databases for national and regional financial institutions; implemented remote control training for faster issue resolution; onsite installation of industry-specific hardware and software; redesigned corporate website with online shopping cart, customer extranet, and employee intranet; developed electronic work order tickets and automated service call dispatch; negotiated contracts and interfaced with vendors; designed and maintained company-wide disaster recovery plan; designed network infrastructure and led relocation of HQ and regional warehouses; maintained Windows Server 2003 environment; organized training for service staff.

experience.title: Information Systems Manager
experience.description: Designed in-house CRM database; designed and implemented Microsoft 2003 SBS; led design of corporate website and internet marketing campaigns; responsible for corporate network security and customer Wi-Fi network.

education.degree: Bachelor of Arts in Business Management

certifications: Microsoft Certified Professional - Windows XP / Windows 2003
Microsoft Certified System Administrator (eligible should be completed by end of 2006)
